text:
DWLS (97.1 FM), branding as Barangay LS 97.1, is a 24/7 Top 40 (CHR)/OPM
/K-Pop FM radio station. It is owned and operated by RGMA (Radio GMA) in the Philippines. The station is an affliate station of GMA Network, Inc. The studio is in GMA Network Center Complex, EDSA corner Timog Avenue, Diliman, Quezon City. Its transmitter is on the GMA Tower of Power Barangay Culiat, Tandang Sora, Quezon City, Philippines.
